name: athenapdf
description: A simple CLI tool to convert HTML to PDF from a local file or a URL to a web page using Electron (Chromium).
author: Ian Lai <ian@arachnys.com>

scripts.build:prepare: mkdir -p build/ && cp -r src/ build/artifacts/ && cp package.json build/artifacts/ && cd build/artifacts/ && npm i --production
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:prepare && npm run build:linux
